ok... conclusion upto now ...
Advantages to Black
Black has 'extra pawn' plus 'passed'
White has one isolated pawn.

Advantages to White
White has two bishops in open position.

2 plans
either play h6, pushing bishop to less important square.
but after h6 later if White wants to exchange his white bishop with knight then either black move the knight or he has to capture bishop with f pawn, and making white's isloated pawn ... passed and dangerous.

other idea is moving the knight right now ...
